mapper.insert: insert into task_attachment (task_id, file_name, file_path, file_size, file_type, uploader_id, upload_time) values (#{taskId}, #{fileName}, #{filePath}, #{fileSize}, #{fileType}, #{uploaderId}, #{uploadTime})
mapper.select: select ta.*, u.name as uploaderName from task_attachment ta left join user u on ta.uploader_id = u.user_id where ta.task_id = #{taskId}
